General.Name: Poya International Co Ltd
General.Description: POYA International Co., Ltd. operates personal beauty and daily merchandise stores in Taiwan. Its stores offer daily necessities, jewelry, decorations, handicrafts, various foods, stationery, and hardware. The company was formerly known as POYA Department Store Co., Ltd. and changed its name to POYA International Co., Ltd. in June 2000. POYA International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 74, Minzu Road, Tainan City, Taiwan

4.Name: Chih-Yuan  Cheng
